#summary Download this library

= Download as jar =
 You can directly download the jar from *Downloads* tab.

= Use Maven Repository =
 If you are using maven , you can add dependency in your pom.xml as follow
{{{
 <dependency>
	<groupId>com</groupId>
	<artifactId>xbean</artifactId>
	<version>1.0.0</version>
 </dependency>
}}}
